en.name: Practice presence with meditation
en.description: Ability to be in the here and now, without judgement and in a state of open-ended presence
en.challenge: **Discuss with a friend:** What helps you to be present here and now and stay open for new thoughts and ideas?
en.resources: Try the meditation [Become Present](https://app.29k.org/JHFWP5HmyySeK8v97) in the 29k app.
